channel.title: Interpolation on Hugo Grimoire
channel.description: Recent content in Interpolation on Hugo Grimoire

item.title: FILM
item.description: FILM GitHub Activate the Conda environment 1conda activate frame_interpolation From the Conda Shell, cd to the FILM directory 1cd C:\Users\trima\FILM Place the images you would like to interpolate in the "photos" directory and run this command to begin interpolating them. 1python -m eval.interpolator_cli --pattern "photos" --model_path pretrained_models\film_net\Style\saved_model --times_to_interpolate 1 --output_video
